MSS.306Collection processed by Ashley Todd, 2011.Fales Library and Special CollectionsFales Library and Special CollectionsElmer Holmes Bobst Library70 Washington Square South3rd FloorNew York, NY 10012Phone: (212) 998-2596fales.library@nyu.eduThis finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace 2018-04-06T20:40:40Description is in English.
Fales Library and Special Collections
Fales Library and Special Collections Audio/Video Collection MSS.306
3 Linear Feet
1960-2011
Arrangement
The collection is organized into two series by format and arranged alphabetically by title. The dates used are the items' copyright years.
The collection is organized into two series by format and items are arranged alphabetically by title. The dates used are the items' copyright years.
Missing Title
Series I: Audio
Series II: Video
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); Fales Library and Special Collection Audio/Video Collection; MSS 306; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.
Conditions Governing Use
Collection use is subject to all copyright laws. Permission to publish materials must be obtained in writing from the Director of Fales Library and Special Collections. Please contact fales.library@nyu.edu. or call 212 998 2596.
Conditions Governing Access
Open to researchers. Appointments are necessary for the use of manuscript and archival collections.
Scope and Content
This collection contains primarily commerically released audio and video materials relating to the Fales Library and Special Collections.
Audiovisual Access Policies and Procedures
Access to audiovisual materials in this collection is available through digitized access copies. Researchers may view an item's original container, but the media themselves are not available for playback because of preservation concerns. Materials that have already been digitized are noted in the collection's finding aid and can be requested in our reading room.â€¨ Series I: Audio211802
Scope and Content
This series contains audio materials on audiocassette and CD including audiobooks, readings and interviews.Bay Mir Bistu Sheyn: Great Songs of the Yiddish Stage, Volume 221175820051

Scope and Contents
Track 1: Men discuss the cultural concerns of their day. Beat Generation figures are mentioned (Jack Kerouac, Neal Cassady and Allen Ginsberg).
Track 2: Radio broadcasts of news and music (jazz, pop and classical).
Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
Original format: 1/4" Open Reel Audio, Duration: 136 min.LeRoi Jones at Panther Benefit, Fillmore East cuid62871968-0620182cuid6287fales_MSS306fales_MSS306_cuid6287_000001
Scope and Contents
Amiri Baraka (LeRoi Jones) gives a 15-minute address to an audience of Black Panther supporters, an event held at the Fillmore East in New York City, 1968.
